headline: Assessing CMS Energy (CMS) Valuation After Recent Share Price Weakness
summary: CMS Energy (CMS) shares have slipped about 2 % on the day and roughly 7 % over the past month, drawing fresh attention to how the Michigan utility’s long term fundamentals compare with its recent price weakness. See our latest analysis for CMS Energy. That dip comes after a steady grind higher, with the latest share price at $69.17 and a modest positive year to date share price return. Longer term total shareholder returns remain solid and suggest momentum is cooling rather than...
